    • Method Detail

      • getMovies

        public java.util.List<Movie> getMovies​(java.lang.String movieTitle)
                                throws CommonException
        This method returns a movie with a specified title. If a title is not specified it will return all movies.
        Parameters:
        movieTitle - specifies the title of the movie customer wants to find (works with a part of a title).
        Returns:
        all movies or movies with specified title if title is specified.
        Throws:
        CommonException - if Movie list is empty (no movies in the database).
        CommonException - if there is no such movie with a given title (if title is specified).

      • getMovieById

        public Movie getMovieById​(java.lang.Long movieId)
                   throws CommonException
        This method returns movie available in the library by its ID.
        Parameters:
        movieId - specifies movie ID (required).
        Returns:
        movie with a specified ID.
        Throws:
        CommonException - if Movie with given ID does not exist.

      • getCategoriesByMovieId

        public java.util.List<Category> getCategoriesByMovieId​(java.lang.Long movieId)
                                                throws CommonException
        This method returns categories assigned to a movie with given ID.
        Parameters:
        movieId - specifies movie ID (required).
        Returns:
        categories assigned to a movie.
        Throws:
        CommonException - if movie with given ID was not found.
        CommonException - if there were no categories assigned to a movie.

      • addMovie

        public void addMovie​(Movie movie)
              throws CommonException
        This method adds a new movie to the database.
        Parameters:
        movie - is a movie object that is sent through request body (required).
        Throws:
        CommonException - if movie with given title already exists.

      • deleteMovie

        public void deleteMovie​(java.lang.Long movieId)
                 throws CommonException
        This method deletes a movie from the database by its ID.
        Parameters:
        movieId - is movie ID (required).
        Throws:
        CommonException - if movie with given id does not exist.

      • manageMovie

        public void manageMovie​(java.lang.Long movieId,
                        java.lang.String movieTitle,
                        java.time.LocalDate releaseDate,
                        java.lang.String actors,
                        java.lang.String description)
                 throws CommonException
        This method updates a movie in the database.
        Parameters:
        movieId - ID of a movie that needs to be updated (required).
        movieTitle - is a title of a movie.
        releaseDate - is a release date of a movie.
        actors - are actors in the movie.
        description - is a description of the movie.
        Throws:
        CommonException - if movie with given ID does not exist.
